doc: How to use inlinedConfScript to configure JAVA_OPTS with maven?
An error will  happen when `mvn package`.

[ERROR] Failed to execute goal org.springframework.boot:spring-boot-maven-plugin:2.1.7.RELEASE:repackage (repackage) on project knowledge-base: \app\knowledge-base.conf (the path can't be found in system.) -> [Help 1]
This looks more like a bug because this file only exists on the server and should be ignored when packaged with maven.
